title: ICE in def_path_hash_to_def_index during cargo check

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code Copying the directory (including `target/`) caused the ICE to stop happening, as did `cargo clean`, so I wasn't able to come up with a minimal example (though I do have a full copy of the code causing the error if that'd be useful). ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.57.0 (f1edd0429 2021-11-29) binary: rustc commit-hash: f1edd0429582dd29cccacaf50fd134b05593bd9c commit-date: 2021-11-29 host: x86_64-pc-windows-msvc release: 1.57.0 LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output Running `cargo check` crashed with this error: ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', compiler\rustc_metadata\src\rmeta\def_path_hash_map.rs:18:85 ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', compiler\rustc_metadata\src\rmeta\def_path_hash_map.rs:18:85 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7fff91aa92cf - ::fmt::h53606b08c01ef688 1: 0x7fff91ad306a - core::fmt::write::he97f21b785b90134 2: 0x7fff91a9b448 - ::fmt::h967100caef347f28 3: 0x7fff91aacd96 - std::panicking::take_hook::hb46205f0055becfd 4: 0x7fff91aac797 - std::panicking::take_hook::hb46205f0055becfd 5: 0x7fff9208a295 - ::flush::hff7a705da113f4ca 6: 0x7fff91aad6a9 - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::hce0846b912adb5c5 7: 0x7fff91aad11f - rust_begin_unwind 8: 0x7fff91aa9bf7 - ::fmt::h53606b08c01ef688 9: 0x7fff91aad0a9 - ::def_path_hash_to_def_id::h9f7b03ae96e81f81 14: 0x7fff9661edc4 - rustc_middle::dep_graph::dep_node:: for rustc_span::def_id::DefId>::recover::h5e74fdbc885e3958 15: 0x7fff9583586d - rustc_query_impl::query_callbacks::adt_def::force_from_dep_node::he666492f1954504a 16: 0x7fff9588cb34 - ::try_mark_green::h79c2867594abd9a1 17: 0x7fff9586497d - ::try_mark_green::h79c2867594abd9a1 18: 0x7fff9554b81e - ::fmt::hdad43e681eb5eae7 19: 0x7fff958526d0 - ::try_mark_green::h79c2867594abd9a1 20: 0x7fff921bf24e - ::fmt::hd8fad7e8b9a18847 21: 0x7fff921d8f6c - rustc_interface::queries::Linker::link::h24820195fd91a4b8 22: 0x7fff9227b315 - rustc_interface::passes::boxed_resolver::BoxedResolver::to_resolver_outputs::h32390bfacafe234b 23: 0x7fff921f3eb2 -
